title: DigitalNoteXDN
author: DigitalNoteXDN
created_time: December 29, 2022, 01:19:57 AMLast edit: December 29, 2022, 10:55:02 AM by DigitalNoteXDN
content: Don't miss out on our Early Bird DEAL of the year! The first 5 people to sign up for a Gold Subscription will receive 2,000,000 XDN. However, there are a few conditions to be aware of:Our new XDN Subscription Service offers a range of exciting features, which you can learn more about at https://www.digitalnote.org/subscriptions.1) The 2,000,000 XDN will be locked in a Masternode for 24 months and cannot be withdrawn until the anniversary date.2) Daily Masternode rewards earned can be transferred to your account at any time.3) To receive the bonus 2,000,000 XDN, you must maintain your Gold subscription for two years. 4) The quarterly and discounted annual subscriptions qualify for this offer.5) Payment must be made using BTC, ETH, or USDT.6) Annually paid Gold subscribers will receive a free Cavoodle NFT and 5,000 2XDN, valued at over 0.1 ETH.7) Offer expires 14/01/2023.So if you are asking if you get 2,000,000 XDN to sign up for a 2 year Gold Subscription paid in ₿ ETH or UDST? - Yes  First 5 onlyIs the Gold subscription worth it? Yes. In addition, the service allows you to host up to 25 MN's on the account using our Mobile Wallet. Over 2 years that alone is valued at over $2,400 based on other hosting service fees. Plus you get a free Cavoodle NFT and 5,000 2XDN both valued at over .1 ETH (~$120 at time of writing)
